meanings.definition: A young chicken suitable for broiling.
meanings.sent1: I cooked delicious broilers for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The broilers at the market looked fresh and plump.
meanings.sent3: The broilers in the coop were clucking happily.
meanings.sent4: The broilers in the oven sizzled and smelled amazing.
meanings.sent5: The farmer raised broilers with care and attention.

meanings.sent1: The new broilers in the kitchen made cooking faster.
meanings.sent2: She used the broilers to make perfectly grilled vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The broilers in the restaurant kitchen were always busy.
meanings.sent4: The broilers in the appliance store were selling quickly.
meanings.sent5: The broilers in the oven evenly cooked the meat.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that broils.
meanings.sent1: The chef was a skilled broilers in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The broilers at the barbecue competition were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The broilers in the sun were getting a tan.
meanings.sent4: The broilers in the argument were heating up.
meanings.sent5: The broilers in the office were always grilling someone.
